channel.title: OLDSCHOOL Anarchy07
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to [b]Anarchy07[/b]. The old-school influenced private server that strives to give you the best experience that we can possible deliver. Our goal is to create a strong-economy with a fun community. We want Skillers and Slayers a like to stand an equal chance within the economy. We want to take all aspects that made RuneScape so great in it's prime and recreate them in a modern-private server.
[b]Client: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6057978/Anarchy%20Client.rar Forums: www.Anarchy07.com[/b]
The concept is simple, we've taken some of the most extraordinary aspects of RuneScape '07, whether it be the minigames, the quests, the skilling, the clue scrolls, you name it, and make it our mission to bring them to life. We want players to mantain that same feeling of progression, completion and pride when playing their accounts and so we have made it our mission to the following things:
[b]Strengthen the Economy[/b] - To aid the new players, we've allowed shops to retain some of the fundamental items such as low level resources and armour. If you want the high level food and armour you're going to have to fight your way for it, skill, or purchase it from skillers. This gives anyone who enjoys skilling an equally good chance of making some nice profits as well as anyone who wishes to just kill to their hearts desire.
[b]Supply Quests[/b] - We've added quests for a number of reasons. The first thing to note is that quests are not full legnth but they do contain some witty, interesting dialogue for anyone who's interested. We've kept them short for those who find them tedious but one thing is for certain, they're always rewarding and our quests will give you that satisfactory feeling - attaining some of the most powerful aspects you can get your hands on [u][b] Features - TL;DR[/b][/u] If you couldn't be bothered to read on the hundreds of reasons as to why you should already be apart of our growing oldschool community, then just let the list of features below convince you!
Oldschool Vibe Strong economy Perfected skills Working quests with storylines Old school bosses 474 areas (Neitiznot, Jatizso, Godwars) Fun Minigames Interactive developers/community Rewarding experience rate Plenty of oldschool action to keep you interested!
You can view our server status page as well as screenshots here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=anarchy07.no-ip.biz
Thanks. Lee.[/center]

item.description:
@Blossm wrote:

[center]Welcome to Anarchy07. The old-school influenced private server that strives to give you the
best experience that we can possible deliver. Our goal is to create a strong-economy with a fun community. We want Skillers
and Slayers a like to stand an equal chance within the economy. We want to take all aspects that made RuneScape so great in
it’s prime and recreate them in a modern-private server.

Client: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6057978/Anarchy%20Client.rar
Forums: www.Anarchy07.com

The concept is simple, we’ve taken some of the most extraordinary aspects of RuneScape '07, whether it be the
minigames, the quests, the skilling, the clue scrolls, you name it, and make it our mission to bring them to life. We want players

mission to the following things:

Strengthen the Economy - To aid the new players, we’ve

food and armour you’re going to have to fight your way for it, skill, or purchase it from skillers. This gives anyone who enjoys
skilling an equally good chance of making some nice profits as well as anyone who wishes to just kill to their hearts desire.

Supply Quests - We’ve added quests for a number of
reasons. The first thing to note is that quests are not full legnth but they do contain some witty, interesting dialogue for
anyone who’s interested. We’ve kept them short for those who find them tedious but one thing is for certain, they’re always
rewarding and our quests will give you that satisfactory feeling - attaining some of the most powerful aspects you can get your
hands on

Features - TL;DR
If you couldn’t be bothered to read on the hundreds of reasons as to why you should already be apart
of our growing oldschool community, then just let the list of features below convince you!

Oldschool Vibe
Strong economy
Perfected skills
Working quests with storylines
Old school bosses
474 areas (Neitiznot, Jatizso, Godwars)
Fun Minigames
Interactive developers/community
Rewarding experience rate
Plenty of oldschool action to keep you interested!

You can view our server status page as well as screenshots here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=anarchy07.no-ip.biz

Thanks.
Lee.[/center]
